text:
Nicolas Chumachenco (also known as Nicolas Chumachenko; March 27, 1944 – December 12, 2020), was a Polish-born Spanish-German violin soloist and professor. He was director of the Queen Sofía Chamber Orchestra. Chumachenco was born in Kraków, Poland.
Chumachenco died on December 12, 2020 in Schallstadt, Germany at the age of 76.
